<js>
if(/process=2/.test(baseUrl)){
	if(/page=1/.test(baseUrl)){
		let s = String(source.getVariable());
		if(/â—â—/.test(s)){
			s = s.replace(/â—â—.*/,'')
			}
			}
	s = String(source.getVariable());
	ck = s.match(/(.*)/)[1];
	s=/â—â—/.test(s)?s.match(/â—â—(.*)/)[1]:baseUrl;
	result = java.ajax(s);
	u = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/novel/novelList?tid=17&process=2&number=0&sell=1&pre="+JSON.parse(result).data.previous_val+"&lnid="+JSON.parse(result).data.latest_nid;
	source.setVariable(ck+"\nâ—â—"+u);
	
	}



//åœ¨ä¸‹é¢æ¥è·å–æˆ‘çš„ä¹¦æ¶
var t = JSON.parse(result)
var u = t.code
if (t.code===9996){
let z = source.getLoginHeader()
check_token()
let Map = JSON.parse(z.replace("&",""));
Map = Map==null?{"ck":""}:Map;
let ck = Map["ck"];
let token = Map["token"]
let headers = {
	"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/117.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
	"Cookie": ck,
	"token":token
}
let url = "https://www.gongzicp.com/webapi/usercoll/getList?page=1&filter=0&sort_key=3&sort_flag=2"
 let re = java.get(url,headers)

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if(/process=2/.test(baseUrl)){
	if(/page=1/.test(baseUrl))source.setVariable("");
	s = source.getVariable();
	s=s!=""?s:baseUrl;
	result = java.ajax(s);
	u = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/novel/novelList?tid=17&process=2&number=0&sell=1&pre="+JSON.parse(result).data.previous_val+"&lnid="+JSON.parse(result).data.latest_nid;
	source.setVariable(u);
	
	}


if(/search\/novels/.test(baseUrl)){
	try{
	//æœç´¢ä½œè€…
url = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/search/novelAndAuthor?k="+java.get("key");

$ = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));

userid = $.data.user.user_id;

url = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/zone/userGetNovelList?uid="+userid+"&type=coll";

aid = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.list[0].author_id;
url = "https://m.gongzicp.com/webapi/zone/userGetNovelList?aid="+aid+"&type=author&page="+java.get("page");

list =JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
a= JSON.parse(result).data.list || []
result = a.concat(list.data.list);
result = JSON.stringify(result);
}catch(e){}
}

if(baseUrl.match(/usercoll\/getList/)){
result=result.replace(/[\s\S]+?<pre.*?>|<\/pre>[\s\S]+/g,'');
}else{
	result=result
}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/fanqx/)){
var a = baseUrl.match(/\/chapter\/(.*?)\.html/);
//java.log(a[1]);
let hrefList = [];
if (a) {
  var b = result.match(/data\-p\="\d+"/g).length;
  if (b) {
    for(let i = 1; i <= b; i++) {
      let href = `https://www.fanqxsw.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"body":"id=${a[1]}&page=${i}","method":"POST"}`;
     //java.log(href);
      hrefList.push(href);
    }
    hrefList
     }
}
}
else{
	var a = baseUrl.match(/\/chapter\/(.*?)\.html/);
//java.log(a[1]);
let hrefList = [];
if (a) {
  var b = result.match(/data\-p\="\d+"/g).length;
  if (b) {
    for(let i = 1; i <= b; i++) {
      let href = `https://www.kelexs.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"body":"id=${a[1]}&page=${i}","method":"POST"}`;
     //java.log(href);
      hrefList.push(href);
    }
    hrefList
     }
}
	}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("æ­£æ–‡è§£å¯†å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè½¬ä¸ºwebViewåŠ¨æ€åŠ è½½ã€‚");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // éå†æ•°ç»„ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é˜…è¯»å†…ç½®Base64è§£ç æ–¹æ³•
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
app=src.match(/APP.content\s?=\s?'(.+?)';/)[1]
appbyte=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(app)
iv=appbyte.slice(32, 48)
key="UC2FmMyG928hRZY4"
key=java.strToBytes(key)
appbyte=appbyte.slice(0,32).concat(appbyte.slice(48))
content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding", key, iv)
        .decryptStr(appbyte);
JSON.parse(content).list
</js>
